plot: In this short comedy about success, failure and crushing the competition, a 29-year-old medical school reject moves back home, only to discover her 11-year-old neighbor is a singing, dancing cardiologist prodigy.
title: The Failure of Pamela Salt
plot_es: In this short comedy about success, failure and crushing the competition, a 29-year-old medical school reject moves back home, only to discover her 11-year-old neighbor is a singing, dancing cardiologist prodigy.
plot_en: In this short comedy about success, failure and crushing the competition, a 29-year-old medical school reject moves back home, only to discover her 11-year-old neighbor is a singing, dancing cardiologist prodigy.
